titles.title: To extend retroactively until January 1, 1996, the prior suspension of duty on amiloride hydrochloride.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/29/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the suspension of duty on n-amidino-3,5-diamino-6-chloropyrazine-carboxamide monohydrochloride dihydrate (also known as amiloride hydrochloride).
